Descriptor.Title: Rhizosphere microbiome of Phragmites australis in Michigan and Ohio, USA

Description.p: Here we describe the microbiome found in the rhizosphere of native and non-native Phragmites australis in Michigan and Ohio, USA. We use amplicon sequencing to identify bacterial, fungal, and oomycete communities in the rhizosphere.
